SubtleCryptoSign.summary:
The sign() method of the
interface generates a digital signature.

remarks.para:
It takes as its arguments a key to sign with, some algorithm-specific
parameters, and the data to sign. It returns a which will be
fulfilled with the signature.

You can use the corresponding method to verify the
signature.

-.
-RFC 3447 specifies RSASSA-PKCS1-v1_5.
-RFC 3447 specifies RSA-PSS.
-FIPS-186 specifies ECDSA.
-FIPS 198-1 specifies HMAC.

SubtleCryptoSign.returns:
A that fulfills with an
containing the signature.
